name: King Slug
description:
Press the A S D F buttons as they lit in succession to gain speed and combo

Use your LMB to deflect and stop interruptions on the field from hurting your slug

Getting hit by interruptions or failing to respond with the correct inputs will cause your slug to lose combo and speed.

Reach the finish line before the other competitors do in order to win the race

All components of the game were made within the 48 hour time window given except for the BGM ( which was also made by us).

Enjoy!

Credit :

Tal Angel - Programming
